title: Can the iPad Pro 2020 12.9 case fit an iPad Pro 1st gen? - Quora

response.answer_text: he new 2nd-generation 11-inch iPad Pro and the 4th-generation 12.9-inch iPad Pro both have the exact same ... your older iPad Pro, the new keyboard cases for the 2020 iPad Pro models will fit the 2018 models as well.
